text: Derez De'Shon Lenard (born March 25, 1989) is an American rapper, singer, and songwriter. He is best known for his single "Hardaway", which peaked at number 61 on the Billboard Hot 100. == Early life == Lenard was born on March 25, 1989, in Atlanta, Georgia. == Career == Although Lenard gained some recognition with singles like "Emotionz" and "Came A Long Way", he wouldn't break out into the mainstream until his single "Hardaway" was released.
